SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevelStatistics

SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevelStatistics Class Reference

Detailed Description

A utility for writing out various statistics of Boxes.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevelStatistics::BoxLevelStatistics ( const BoxLevel &  box_level  )  [explicit]

Constructor.

Compute and store statistics for the given BoxLevel. The statistics reflects the current BoxLevel state and can be printed out afterwards. All processes in the BoxLevel's SAMRAI_MPI must call this constructor because it requires collective communication.

Parameters:
[in] box_level BoxLevel to compute statistics for.
Precondition:
box_level.isInitialized()

Member Function Documentation

void SAMRAI::hier::BoxLevelStatistics::printBoxStats ( std::ostream &  os,
const std::string &  border 
) const

Print out local and globally reduced statistics on the Boxes.

Parameters:
[in,out] os The output stream
[in] border A string to print at the start of every line in the output.
